languages.text: Whenever the creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it erupts with poisonous pus, dealing 8 damage to all adjacent creatures.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the creature suffers melee damage, it erupts with poisonous pus, dealing 8 damage to all adjacent creatures.
Whenever the creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it erupts with poisonous pus, dealing 8 damage to all adjacent creatures.
Whenever the creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it erupts with poisonous pus, dealing 8 damage to all adjacent creatures.

languages.text: 每当此生物受到{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，都会喷出有毒的脓液，对邻近所有生物造成8点伤害。
languages.original_text: Whenever the creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it erupts with poisonous pus, dealing 8 damage to all adjacent creatures.

traits.locale_text: 每当此生物受到近战伤害时，都会喷出有毒的脓液，对邻近所有生物造成8点伤害。

languages.text: Когда существо получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, брызги его ядовитого гноя наносят 8 урона всем целям на соседних клетках.
languages.original_text: Whenever the creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it erupts with poisonous pus, dealing 8 damage to all adjacent creatures.

traits.locale_text: Когда существо получает урон в ближнем бою, брызги его ядовитого гноя наносят 8 урона всем целям на соседних клетках.
Когда существо получает урон в ближнем бою, брызги его ядовитого гноя наносят 8 урона всем целям на соседних клетках.

languages.text: この生物が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるたび、毒の膿を噴出し、隣接するすべての生物に8ダメージを与える。
languages.original_text: Whenever the creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it erupts with poisonous pus, dealing 8 damage to all adjacent creatures.

traits.locale_text: この生物が近接ダメージを受けるたび、毒の膿を噴出し、隣接する全ての生物に8ダメージを与える。

languages.text: Cuando la criatura sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, suelta un pus venenoso que inflige 8 de daño a todas las criaturas adyacentes.
languages.original_text: Whenever the creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it erupts with poisonous pus, dealing 8 damage to all adjacent creatures.

traits.locale_text: Cuando la criatura sufre daño cuerpo a cuerpo, suelta un pus venenoso que inflige 8 de daño a todas las criaturas adyacentes.

languages.text: Wenn die Kreatur {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfschaden{/g} erleidet, bricht giftiger Eiter aus ihr hervor, der allen Kreaturen auf angrenzenden Feldern dabei 8 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt.
languages.original_text: Whenever the creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it erupts with poisonous pus, dealing 8 damage to all adjacent creatures.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn die Kreatur Nahkampfschaden erleidet, bricht giftiger Eiter aus ihr hervor und verursacht dabei 8 Schaden bei allen angrenzenden Kreaturen.

languages.text: Chaque fois que la créature subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, elle déclenche une éruption de pus empoisonné qui inflige 8 points de dégâts à toutes les créatures adjacentes.
languages.original_text: Whenever the creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it erupts with poisonous pus, dealing 8 damage to all adjacent creatures.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que la créature subit des dégâts de mêlée, elle déclenche une éruption de pus empoisonné qui inflige 8 points de dégâts à toutes les créatures adjacentes.

languages.text: Yaratık, her {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarına{/g} maruz kaldığında zehirli irin püskürterek bitişikteki tüm yaratıklara 8 puan hasar verir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the creature suffers {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, it erupts with poisonous pus, dealing 8 damage to all adjacent creatures.
